title: Educational Innovation Conference
description: International conference exploring innovative teaching methodologies in engineering education, with focus on sustainability and digital transformation in higher education.
content_markdown:
## Transforming Engineering Education

An international conference bringing together educators, researchers, and industry experts to discuss the **future of engineering education** in the context of sustainability and digital innovation.

## Conference Themes

### Digital Transformation
- Online and hybrid learning models
- Virtual laboratories and simulations
- AI-enhanced educational tools
- Digital assessment methods

### Sustainability Integration
- Embedding green principles in curriculum
- Project-based sustainability learning
- Industry-academia collaboration
- Student engagement strategies

## Keynote Speakers

- **Prof. Maria Rodriguez** - Digital Learning Innovation, Technical University of Catalonia
- **Dr. James Chen** - Sustainable Manufacturing, MIT
- **Anna Kowalski** - Industry Perspective, Siemens Education

## Session Formats

1. Plenary presentations
2. Parallel workshop sessions
3. Poster presentations
4. Panel discussions
5. Networking lunch and coffee breaks

### Registration Benefits

- Access to all sessions and workshops
- Conference proceedings (digital)
- Networking opportunities
- Certificate of attendance
- Coffee breaks and lunch included

*Early bird registration available until March 31, 2026*
